long_description: From playground to campground to the beach, the Teva Tirra girls' sandals supply fun, strappy style and an easily adjustable, supportive fit for comfort wherever her adventures take her. Polyester webbing and synthetic leather uppers stand up to the demands of multisport use; straps easily adjust with rip-and-stick tabs to supply a personalized and secure fit. Neoprene backs the straps for added comfort; moisture-wicking polyester mesh linings are soft against bare skin and dry quickly. Soft, compression-molded EVA topsoles and midsoles absorb shock and transfer it for enhanced push-off energy; antimicrobial treatment helps deter odors. Nonmarking rubber outsoles supply traction on most surfaces.
short_description: From playground to campground to the beach, the Teva Tirra girls' sandals supply fun, strappy style and an easily adjustable, supportive fit for comfort wherever her adventures take her.
